title: Lensly
description: AI-driven photo curation SaaS for photographers. From batch upload to semantic search and prompt-based actions.
context: Building an AI-assisted platform that helps photographers organize, curate and deliver albums faster.
challenge: Handle large photo batches, provide quality/intent curation and enable a prompt-first UX simpler than traditional galleries.
solution: Next.js front end with a persistent prompt bar; Laravel backend for orchestration; Redis caching; CLIP/OpenAI for technical+artistic scoring and semantic search; workers for heavy processing; CDN for delivery.
impacts: Reduced manual triage by enabling prompt-first curation flows.
Higher perceived quality via AI ranking (technical + artistic scoring).
Faster album turnaround with background processing and CDN delivery.
Clear product story that differentiates from classic gallery tools.

title: Agency Analytics — AI Summary & Data Aggregation
description: Backend services to aggregate multi-widget data and generate AI summaries for marketing reports.
context: Dashboards with dozens of widgets and multiple sources required reliable aggregation and automated insights.
challenge: Move expensive aggregations to the server, reduce latency, and produce consistent AI summaries.
solution: Laravel services for section-scoped data aggregation; Redis caching by section/date; standardized prompts for OpenAI; observability with tracing and metrics.
impacts: More responsive dashboards and simpler front-end code.
Consistent summaries across sections through standardized prompting.
Lower compute waste via targeted caching and scoped APIs.
Actionable insights into hot paths thanks to tracing/metrics.

title: Pixieset
description: Contributions to high-traffic photography tools: galleries, delivery and creator workflows.
context: Large-scale platform supporting professional photographers and creators.
challenge: Maintain feature velocity without compromising performance and reliability.
solution: Full-stack contributions across Laravel services and React components; query-plan reviews; strategic caching; tighter DX and accessibility.
impacts: Smoother creator workflows and sturdier foundations for new features.
Lower latency on critical paths through caching and query tuning.
Cleaner, more accessible UI components ready for reuse.
Risk-aware rollouts for high-traffic releases.

title: HyperGrowth MVP Orchestrator (n8n + LLMs)
description: Automation pipeline that turns product ideas into MVP plans, backlogs and docs using AI agents.
context: Compress discovery and planning time for internal and client MVPs.
challenge: Coordinate inputs, knowledge bases, comms and governance with repeatability.
solution: n8n workflows orchestrating LLM agents (OpenAI/Anthropic) to generate scope, user stories and docs; syncing to Notion, GitHub and Slack; guardrails for consistency.
impacts: Shorter time-to-first-iteration with clearer scope.
Backlogs and docs generated with consistent quality.
Single source of truth across Notion/GitHub.
Repeatable prompts and policies to prevent drift.

title: SHOWUP1
description: Professional network for artists, athletes and models with short-form video profiles.
context: Discovery marketplace where talent is showcased via concise video reels.
challenge: Fast uploads, moderation, scheduling and multi-platform reach.
solution: Laravel + Next.js architecture; workers for media processing; CDN; Tailwind component library for consistent UI.
impacts: Streamlined onboarding and clear path from profile to booking.
Reliable media pipeline with background processing and CDN.
Faster build-out via reusable UI components.
Reduced deployment friction with CI/CD.

title: Caliver Labs — Productized Templates & White-Label
description: Catalog of ready-to-ship templates (SaaS, APIs, automations) for fast client delivery.
context: Offer affordable, time-boxed solutions to startups and solo founders.
challenge: Balance customization with repeatability and cost control.
solution: Library of Next.js/Laravel starters, n8n automations and deployment blueprints with clear SLAs and docs.
impacts: Shorter lead time with predictable pricing.
Standardized deliverables (docs, scripts, IaC) reduce setup effort.
Opinionated starters for common SaaS patterns (auth, billing, CRUD).
Packaged automations keep scope aligned from intake to backlog.

title: CarltonOne Engagement
description: Features and integrations for a global engagement/rewards platform.
context: Mature product with complex partner integrations and compliance needs.
challenge: Ship new capabilities without destabilizing critical paths.
solution: Scoped Laravel services with strong boundaries; robust tests; staged rollouts; enhanced observability.
impacts: Safer releases with fewer regressions on sensitive flows.
Isolated complexity through well-scoped services.
Improved visibility on partner integrations via metrics/traces.

title: Ministério Público do Acre (MPAC)
description: Government systems for internal workflows, mobile access and reporting.
context: Modernize processes and enable mobile-first access for non-technical staff.
challenge: Balance security, reliability and usability across roles.
solution: Laravel apps with role-based access; mobile-friendly views; auditable operations and logs.
impacts: Clearer workflows and lower friction in daily operations.
Role-aware interfaces simplified routine tasks.
Audit trails improved accountability on sensitive actions.
Better onboarding thanks to documented processes.

title: Challenge Intercâmbio
description: Web platform for education travel — leads, sales pipeline and student journey.
context: Digitalize end-to-end processes for an education travel agency.
challenge: Track leads → quotes → enrollment and keep data in sync.
solution: Laravel back office + public site; staged pipelines; notifications and exports.
impacts: Better visibility across the sales and enrollment pipeline.
Automated status changes reduced manual work.
Decision-making improved with basic analytics and exports.
Higher reliability compared to legacy spreadsheets.

title: Dub Soluções
description: Business apps and mobile experiences for local clients (iOS/Android).
context: Ship pragmatic solutions under tight budgets and timelines.
challenge: Maintain quality while delivering fast for small teams.
solution: Laravel APIs; React/Hybrid mobile; shared UI kits; light CI to prevent regressions.
impacts: Predictable delivery with maintainable codebases.
Reusable modules accelerated feature development.
Handover docs enabled teams to operate independently.
